items.sentence: My favorite city in the whole world is Boston.
Tom withdrew some money from his bank account.
I had a really wonderful time at Tom\'s house.
When was the first time that you played poker?
I find myself thinking about you all the time.
I have a spare key to my house hidden outside.
I have homework that has to been done tonight.
You shouldn\'t drive if you\'ve been drinking.
Tom told me that he wasn\'t going to be there.
I can pick you up from work if you want me to.
